    • Method Detail

      • init

        public boolean init(URI uri,
                    Path file,
                    String fileRef)
             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileInitializer
        Initialize a file resource
        Specified by:
        init in interface FileInitializer
        Parameters:
        uri - the remote URI of the resource acting as its source
        file - the local file resource to initialize. (often in ${jetty.base} directory)
        fileRef - the simple string reference to the output file, suitable for searching for the file in other locations (like ${jetty.home} or ${jetty.dir})
        Returns:
        true if local file is initialized (resulted in a change on disk), false if this FileInitializer did nothing.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an attempt to initialize, but an error occurred.

      • download

        protected void download(URI uri,
                        Path file)
                 throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isFilePresent

        protected boolean isFilePresent(Path... paths)
                         throws IOException
        Test if any of the Paths exist (as files)
        Parameters:
        paths - the list of paths to check
        Returns:
        true if the path exist (as a file), false if it doesn't exist
        Throws:
        IOException - if the path points to a non-file, or is not readable.
